# The `InputArg` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/inputarg">InputArg</a> - This struct carries flags and type information about a single incoming (formal) argument or incoming (from the perspective of the caller) return value virtual register. <a href="#details">More...</a>

### PartOffset {#a9fba19399a5f8479127404f20c5fd6c6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::ISD::InputArg::PartOffset">
Offset in bytes of current input value relative to the beginning of original argument.

E.g. if argument was splitted into four 32 bit registers, we got 4 InputArgs with PartOffsets 0, 4, 8 and 12.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetcallingconv-h/#l00213">213</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetcallingconv-h">TargetCallingConv.h</a>.
